channel.title: Dbow team?
channel.description: hey, so i am about done with final exams, and then i have winter break:))) ( last final is tomorrow ) but anyways, this is always something i kinda have wanted to do for a while, and that is get a team of combat level around 68-72 (im level 70 on pure) and go to either world 18 or just a high risk world, go to multi and own anyone we can find xD ( all of us specing at the same time) but so i was wondering if any of you would like to join only requirments are to be able to use a dbow and be around 68-72 combat. also some rules: No killing other team mates, please no flaming, and also try to attack when i say so :D if anyone wants to join just PM me, or comment on here( i am on my ipod right now but will be back on after i finish my english final at9:25 am central. hope to see people join:)

item.title: Dbow team?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:13, topic:426023”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=528710.msg3859412#msg3859412 date=1324585319]
Yeah so I is right? Cause the thing is you don’t waaant toooo many people = aka crap lootage p/h;3.
[/quote]Not necessarily. Smaller clans, who all rush at ONCE, can get some great loot, especially if you lure others (if its against the rules here we wouldn’t)[/quote]
Yeah if there near maxed as nobody risks at level 74:L.

item.title: Dbow team?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

bob tomato12:

Explain what you mean? You don’t rush multiple people or that’d be a clan… You kill the derp then whoever gets loot picks up while the team pretty much attack there team for literally 10-15secs then all tele split and continue?

What i’m looking for is to get a team of multiple people using a dark bow (multiple people specing one person) so that he almost instantly dies lol. (multiple D Bow specs to one person = destruction )
[/quote]
Yeah so I is right? Cause the thing is you don’t waaant toooo many people = aka crap lootage p/h;3.

Read full topic

item.title: Dbow team?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:8, topic:426023”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=528710.msg3857943#msg3857943 date=1324489515]
What I’d recommend personally is blitz+g mauler. Tb+other spec wep i’m not too sure about d bow as its quite a slow wep + another d bow for a pretty much garentee’d k0. No need for bolas… pures have 1 def, your garentee’d to hit on one person and yous will hit over 1200hp most probably that’d be two rocktail brews if they were lets say 70hp.
[/quote]Its a rushing team, not single rushing pking.[/quote]
Explain what you mean? You don’t rush multiple people or that’d be a clan… You kill the derp then whoever gets loot picks up while the team pretty much attack there team for literally 10-15secs then all tele split and continue?

Read full topic

item.title: Dbow team?
item.dc:creator: @bob_tomato12 bob tomato12
item.description:
@bob_tomato12 wrote:

YES, i love doing that :D. The reason though i was asking about a Dbow team was because i wanna see like 10 dragon heads fly and one person and kill him (or her) XD :eek:
But yeah, i tried that combo after watching one of 3njoy Lumby’s videos (the dbow to gmaul combo)
Thanks for the suggestion!

Read full topic

item.title: Dbow team?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Aah d bow rushing, you should mix it up a bit ;o. As personally I can see when people are going to d bow me so i pray in time then rocktail brew so maybe if you got a melee’r or something to go g maul them first so there distracted by that and literally 0.5 seconds later just d bow pile or something? Or a d scim’er if you have a few people meleeing even they don’t pray its nice to be on the safe side:D.
Just advice:P.

Read full topic
